english: on the one hand...on the other hand (l)
on the one hand...on the other hand (p)
to have just done something (+ inf.)

clarification: change in emotion, mood, or physical appearance and many other traits
example: En aquel día me puse enfermo

clarification: involuntary change that usually applies to people not inanimate objects
deliberate or voluntary change, often refers to change in identity or affiliation
for skin tone or hair color
In relation to the sky, clear skies
Can be used in a context of temperature, maths or extent
